comments:
In a derived product (off Hyades 3.3), we build the trace model using aggregated
method invocations. The execution statistics view shows up correctly. But when I
right click on a row on the table and select "Open Method Invocation" I get a
ClassCastException. The code in searchPattern() method is blindly assuming that
the invocation list in TRCMethod is of type TRCFullMethodInvocation. It needs to
check before it can cast it. The stack trace of failure:

java.lang.ClassCastException:
org/eclipse/hyades/models/trace/impl/TRCAggregatedMethodInvocationImpl
incompatible with org/eclipse/hyades/models/trace/TRCFullMethodInvocation
at
